fullText: The musical adaptation of the Avett Brothers' folk-rock catalog feels emotionally authentic, even when the plot occasionally feels forced into the framework of their existing songs.
dtliExcerpt: The musical adaptation of the Avett Brothers' folk-rock catalog feels emotionally authentic, even when the plot occasionally feels forced into the framework of their existing songs.
